You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/apache/ignite/network/alerts).

title: IGNITE-19359 .NET: Fix 'Affinity keys are not supported' exception
body:
1. Support hash calculation for affinity keys.
2. When partition awareness hash still can't be computed, do not throw an exception; log a warning (once per type) and use the default connection.
